channel.title: Softlayer_billing_item_network_loadbalancer on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_item_network_loadbalancer on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer represents the [[SoftLayer_Billing_Item|billing item]] related to a single [[SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer|load balancer]] instance. seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Item SoftLayer_Network_LoadBalancer Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Network_LoadBalancer

Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.
